slider.statement1: For more beautiful society and individual life
slider.statement2: To creative IT organization with evolution

message.title: Messages From Representative
message.paragraph1: In the short 8 years since E-Business was established, the global depression, the great earthquake in east Japan, Abenomics... We expirenced lots of intense changes of the society. With the support of our customers and partners, we conquered all of those difficulties, and finally meet up with the vigorous 8th year. Please allow me express my appreciation to all of our friends.
message.paragraph2: As our society progressing forward, the revolution in IT industry happened even faster, and we deeply felt the fierceness of modern company competition. With such sense of crisis, we think it is very important to follow up to the trend, imporve our internal communicate and initiative.
message.paragraph3: To build a more professional and more reliable company, and also for the profits of our customers and employees, we will take new challenges and innovations as usual, keep the endless self improvement as daily task.
message.paragraph4: In the coming days, we sincerely need every precious instructions and suggestions from all of our friends.
message.paragraph5: CEO of E-Business Inc. Hua DongJiang

info1.title: The purpose of using and providing
info1.content: The personal information we required from you like name, birth day, address etc. are used and only used in the process of our recruitment. We will not publish or transfer your private information for other purpose.

info2.title: The usage of private information
info2.content: The E-Business Inc. will in charge of the management of your private information. As our recruitment events finish, your private information will be eliminate/delete by us as part of our responsibility.

info3.title: The range of private information
info3.content: The personal information we required are limited in the minimun range for finish recruitment events. If you don't agree with this announcement, we may not accept your application.

info4.title: Publish, modification and elimination
info4.content: You can ask us to publish your private information to 3rd-party. and you can also ask us to modifty or delete the published information. In such cases, please contact us with the method below.

info5.title: Contact
info5.content: To publish, modify or delete your private information, plases contact us with:

form.title: Contact Us
form.description: If you have questions, please feel free to contact us. Fill the form below and press send button.
